name: Lock-ness Monster
description: A large amphibious dinosaur like monster with a long neck and fins instead of legs.

name: Cthulu
description: An enormous being with a tentacle covered face rumoured to be sleeping at the bottom of the ocean.

name: Bigfoot
description: A slightly larger than man sized monster covered in white hair.

name: Tooth Fairy
description: Unsighted however when a child leaves a tooth under their pillow it will take the tooth and leave a coin

name: Guy
description: A nice looking kid that helped me with my code.

name: Godzilla
description: A gigantic iguana altered by radiation it breathes fire and destroys buildings with ease
